item.title: Usage example of Linux Mailbox framework - MTK ADSP IPC
item.description: Document and source code 🔗The offcial kernel mailbox framework document: https://docs.kernel.org/driver-api/mailbox.html There’re 2 main part mentioned in the doc, Controller driver and Client driver. The implementation of the framework on the MTK ADSP IPC can be found at these links. Controller driver: https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/source/drivers/mailbox/mtk-adsp-mailbox.c Client driver: https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/source/drivers/firmware/mtk-adsp-ipc.c THe device uses the client driver: https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/source/sound/soc/sof/mediatek/mt8186/mt8186.c#L364 https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/source/sound/soc/sof/mediatek/mt8186/mt8186.c#L85 Related DTS nodes: https://elixir.bootlin.com/linux/latest/source/arch/arm64/boot/dts/mediatek/mt8186.dtsi#L1135 Overview of MTK ADSP IPC 🔗The overall architecture of the MTK ADSP IPC can be depict as following figure.
